column4: I'm creating a startup disk from ubuntu machine. Can I installed any application into it after booting it and that application should be available once I install from the startup disk. is it posible?
I'm not sure if you can do that with a cd/dvd install, but you can if you use the live usb with persistence

I created persistence startup disk used 2 gb pendrive. So now I can install application into it and then use this pendrive to install in other machine along with newly installed applications, I'm I right ?
